channel.title: Comments on: #50startups PulsedLight Acquired by Garmin

item.title: By: Keeping Track: 3 Months, 3 Acquisitions of Bend Companies | StartupBend
item.dc:creator: Keeping Track: 3 Months, 3 Acquisitions of Bend Companies | StartupBend
item.description: […] PulsedLight — maker of tiny, inexpensive distance sensors — was purchased by Texas-based…in January for an undisclosed amount. Co-founders Bob Lewis and Dennis Corey are staying on with Garmin for the next few years. They noted that they’ll be hiring engineers and other technical positions to help them continue their product development at the new Garmin office in Bend. […]
item.content:encoded: […] PulsedLight — maker of tiny, inexpensive distance sensors — was purchased by Texas-based…in January for an undisclosed amount. Co-founders Bob Lewis and Dennis Corey are staying on with Garmin for the next few years. They noted that they’ll be hiring engineers and other technical positions to help them continue their product development at the new Garmin office in Bend. […]
